#summary The EL is a mix of several kind of languages. But in difference with any existing language, an EL program source is made of arrows and works with arrows.

= Introduction =

EL (_Entrelacs Language_) is a mix of:
   # Lambda Calculus, Lisp.
   # Combinatory Logic, Rewriting rules based languages.
   # Inference engine languages (Prolog), Query language (SQL).
